org.apache.logging.log4j.io.internal

Class InternalBufferedInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • java.io.FilterInputStream
        • java.io.BufferedInputStream
          • org.apache.logging.log4j.io.internal.InternalBufferedInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class InternalBufferedInputStream
extends BufferedInputStream
    Internal class that exists primiarly to allow location calculations to work.
    Since:
    2.12
